input.description:
connection details [Optional] It should be entered as an XML document. It contains server specific connection details. Values supplied here override the values in the adapter configuration.
Sample: <connection-details> <user-credential-file>path to user_info.dat file</user-credential-file> <user-role>BladeLogic user role, such as BLAdmins</user-role> <connection-details>
script name This is the command or script to be executed. It is one of the BL CLI commands located in the BL CLI namespaces or a Jython script or batch files.

argument list [Optional] Enter the argument list for the BL CLI command in an XML document of <argument> elements. The argument list must be entered in the sequence defined by the BL CLI Help document.
Sample XML:
<arguments> <argument>job</argument> <argument>true</argument> </arguments>

Type of command.
Allowed values: nsh, cli, jython
